  • Method Details

    • set

      void set(T value) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the value of the property. If the provided value is invalid according to the validators, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the valid is invalid

    • setIfValid

      void setIfValid(T value)
      Sets the value of the property. If the provided value is invalid according to the validators, the previous value is kept and no listeners are invoked.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to set

    • setOrDefault

      void setOrDefault(T value)
      Sets the value of the property. If the provided value is invalid according to the validators, the default value of the property will be set instead.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to set

    • reset

      void reset()
      Resets the property to the default value.

    • getDefaultValue

      T getDefaultValue()
      Gets the default value of the property.
      Returns:
      The default value of the property

    • isDefault

      boolean isDefault()
      Returns whether the property is currently set to the default value according to Objects.equals(Object, Object).
      Returns:
      true if the value of the property equals the default value, false otherwise

    • isDefault

      boolean isDefault(T value)
      Returns whether the value is equal to the default value according to Objects.equals(Object, Object).
      Parameters:
      value - The value to check whether it is equal to the properties default value
      Returns:
      true if the value equals the default value, false otherwise

    • getId

      net.minecraft.util.Identifier getId()
      Gets the identifier of the property. This consists of the namespace provided when building the config with Config.builder(String) and the name of the property provided when building the property with ConfigTab.create???Property().
      Returns:
      The identifier of the property.
